q: Roger Goodell today, and Roger Goodell wasn't referring to Michael Vick 's Pro Bowl 2010 season. Instead, Roger Goodell was talking about the way Michael Vick has handled himself off the field since being released from prison. We're looking for success stories, Roger Goodell said. Roger Goodell was responding to a question about the Super Bowl party that Michael Vick 's name had been attached to, and Roger Goodell suggested that Michael Vick was never involved in the planning of that party.

LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc. wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying.
